attributes.action: Limit mail-order marketing which targets elderly and vulnerable people.
attributes.background: Unsolicited marketing material and door-to-door sales personnel frequently target people who are elderly and vulnerable, pressurising them to buy goods which they do not need, will not use and can’t afford.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to change the law on mail order marketing.
